definition[0]: the direction that is at the bottom of a map of the world, below the Equator. It is on the right if you are facing the rising sun
example[1]: By now, the army was approaching from the south.
example[2]: Gatwick airport is a few miles to the south of London.
definition[1]: in the south, or facing the south
example[3]: a village on the south coast
example[4]: I am currently teaching in south Texas.
definition[2]: a south wind comes from the south
example[5]: Most of the birds had already flown south.
example[7]: a seaside town 99 km south of London
